Name: My Desktop Girlfriend
About the game: Are you bored? Have you given up on reality to sit at your computer from morning till late at night and play games? I understand, I understand perfectly... but you don't have to do this alone! Our application will allow you to choose one of 14 beautiful girls who will always accompany you on your computer! Scroll through the social media feed, search for YouTube videos, listen to ASMR, watch anime. Whatever you do, your Desktop girlfriend will always be with you. Solve simple puzzles to unlock girls Choose clothes for your girl Enjoy a relaxing soundtrack Desktop Girl is a loyal friend who loves you, she will always be there for you so that you don't feel lonely.
